OrgName: MBG Expense Mangement, LLC and its wholly owned subsidiaries (formerly MBG Telecom Software)
PPLoc: Available upon request by contacting organization.
activities: MBG is an ASP of Web Based Chargeback, Invoice Presentation and Asset Management Systems. Some of this information, primarily telephone call detail information, is identified to the employee level. This information is collected primarily for billing purposes and MBG gives its customers tools to limit access to and  the use of this information for other purposes.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Germany, Greece, Italy, Netherlands, Portugal, Spain, Sweden, United Kingdom
recoursemech: MBG is committed to cooperating with data protection authorities located in the European Union or their authorized representatives
